title: vairAgya nilai
sahitya:
vairAgya nilai eLidO jnAna


anupallavi

  dhairyamAna tAnanda nilai tarum samadama titIkSAdi sAdhana jayam pera


caraNam    turavuk-kOTTaiyaip-pAsha uravu kaip-paTrumO toDai naDungik-kOzhai paDai eDukkak-kiTTumO
piravip-piNiyai mATrum periya turiya nilai peTrup-paTraTruLLE pErinba niSTaiyAm
